teaser: First up, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-In-Chief of Reviews at CNET talks about GoPro and why they're doing so well despite the decline of point-and-shoot digital cameras. Plus, a conversation with Nicholas Carr, author of The Glass Cage, on the hidden costs of automation and taking pleasure in difficult work.
